actions.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 180 (Roll no. 601).
Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Denham to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Denham to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 180 (Roll no. 601).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment clarifies the intent of Congress and ensures that the motor-carrier industry can operate under one standard when engaging in commerce and pre-empts a patchwork of 50 different State meal and rest break laws to provide certainty for regional carriers doing business.
purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to clarify the intent of Congress and ensure the motor-carrier industry can operate under one standard when engaging in commerce.
